definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: And how can Santa come down our skinny little chimney?
sentences.chinese: 还有，圣诞熊怎样从我们家窄窄的小烟囱下来？

sentences.english: There's a funny smell of soot blowing down the chimney.
sentences.chinese: 烟囱里倒灌进一股刺鼻的煤烟。

sentences.english: So go ahead. Enter that beer-funneling contest.
sentences.chinese: 去吧，加入啤酒烟囱比赛。

sentences.english: Smoke curls slowly from the chimney.
Learn how to attach the chimney to a birdhouse in this free video about making birdhouses.
sentences.chinese: 了解如何在这个自由附加视频烟囱一禽舍有关使鸟屋。

sentences.english: it is only the morningsun shining on the chimney-top.
sentences.chinese: 那只是早上的阳光照在烟囱上。

sentences.english: Marty: He says Santa is too fat to come down our Chimney.
sentences.chinese: 他说圣诞老人太胖了，下不来我们的烟囱。

sentences.english: Several chimneys blew down during the storm.
sentences.chinese: 有几个烟囱在暴风雨中刮倒了。

sentences.english: The factory chimneys puff dense smoke into the air.
sentences.chinese: 工厂的烟囱向空中喷吐着浓烟。

sentences.english: How do we get into people's homes when there are no chimneys on the houses to climb down?
sentences.chinese: 比如，当人们的住宅没有烟囱可爬时，我们如何进屋？

sentences.english: Logistics systems are a lot of stovepipes not talking to each other.
sentences.chinese: 后勤系统很多是烟囱式的，相互之间不能互通。

sentences.english: The utility model is the dust-proof cover for chimneys with practicability.
sentences.chinese: 是一种很具有实用价值的烟囱防尘罩。

sentences.english: A high wind blustered round the house, and roared in the chimney it sounded wild and stormy .
sentences.chinese: 大风绕屋咆哮，并在烟囱里怒吼，听起来狂暴猛烈。

sentences.english: The wall juts out here to allow room for the chimney.
sentences.chinese: 墙在这里凸了出来，以给烟囱留下位置。

sentences.english: We put a fine wirework mesh over the chimney so that birds can't get in.
sentences.chinese: 我们在烟囱上盖了金属丝网，这样鸟儿就进不去了。

sentences.english: On the chimney were long spills for lighting them.
sentences.chinese: 烟囱上放着点烟的长引柴。

definition: a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
to have smoke billowing from a fireplace or stove (due to a blockage in the chimney)
